meanings.sent1: She gave the document only a cursory glance before signing it.

meanings.definition: Done quickly with little attention to detail
meanings.sent1: The chef's cursory preparation resulted in a bland dish.
meanings.sent2: He made a cursory attempt at fixing the leaky faucet.
meanings.sent3: The cursory painting job left streaks of different colors on the wall.
meanings.sent4: Her cursory cleaning of the room left dust bunnies in every corner.
meanings.sent5: The cursory inspection missed the cracked foundation of the house.
